title: May have lost Orange essence?
body: I don't remember purchasing anything with my orange essence and I had around 1.5k now I go back and check and I'm at 395. I have no proof of any of this so I don't expect to get any back but wasn't sure if it's possible for you guys to check if there were purchases made or it actually just made me lose it. Sorry I have a memory problem! Thank you.

replies.body: I'm seeing 845 Orange Essence on the account.  I don't see anything being used recently to spend that.  Is this still an issue?

Yeah I disenchanted recently to get up to that, pretty sure I must have got a skin awhile back with my orange essence and just completely forgot about it, Thanks for checking! Sorry for the mistake XD.
